sentence.Network_en: His yurt stood behind the temple.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的蒙古包就在那座庙背后.

sentence.Network_en: In December 1999, Dima was shot in the chest in the village of Alkhan - Yurt.
sentence.Network_cn: 1999年12月, 迪玛在阿尔罕-尤尔特(Alkhan-Yurt)村胸部中弹.

sentence.Network_en: Herdsmen are rigging up a Mongolian yurt as a new domicile.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧民们正在新的居住地搭建蒙古包.

list.abs: from now to October , the prairie is green . we can live a hotel in Hailar or a Mongolian yurt on the grassland .现今到十月前，草原的草已经变绿，我们可以选择住在海拉尔市，或者直接住在草原里的蒙古包里面。
哈萨克玷房 kazak yurt 月亮湖 moon lake 土家水上街市 tujia overwater market 天一阁 tianyi pavilion 仙居南峰塔 Nanfeng pagoda in xianju 景颇寨 jingpo.

the transformation of the Urban yurt is by a series of zippers and acted as fastening , thus the Urban yurt can be de-construct and re-constructed to different functions .整各都市蒙古包的转换变形是藉由一连串的扣子及拉链的解开与重组而构成，因此都市蒙古包可以转变成多种角色。
in yurts to eat dinner , the evening campfire in the evening kindling , and yurts to live .晚餐在蒙古包吃，傍晚点燃篝火晚会，住蒙古包。
He and his wife were both born in yurts ., 他和他的妻子都是在帐篷里出生的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Russian yurta, via French or German from Turkic jurt

means.word_mean: 1. a circular domed dwelling that is portable and self-supporting; originally used by nomadic Mongol and Turkic people of central Asia but now used as inexpensive alternative or temporary housing
